project.description:
The intention of this is to be a logging interceptor to use MDC and to also help send the MDC as part of X-Correlation-ID header to make tracking logs easy. Also want to potentially use log appender to push logs to say aws cloudwatch.
Also, just putting in here a reference to: https://blog.sebastian-daschner.com/entries/logging-performance-comparison Try to keep logs to minimum or at debug level to be turned on when needed.
